src:
Nadal u polufinalu, Conga kratkog daha
01 Nov 2019, 22:52 by Darko
Još dva koraka dele Rafela Nadala od titule na jednom od dva Mastersa koji mu nedostaju u kolekciji. Španac se plasirao u polufinale Pariza, tako što je u dva seta bio bolji od Žoa Vilfrida Conge 7:6(4), 6:1 posle sat i 36 minuta igre u Bersiju.
Conga je odlično servirao u prvom setu i nije dozvolio nijednu brejk loptu, od ponedeljka ponovo, prvom teniseru sveta. Imao je iskusni Francuz svoju malu šansu u taj brejku, ali je on pripao Nadalu sa 7:4.
Prave borbe u drugom seti nije ni bilo, Španac je rano došao do brejka, poveo sa 3:0, a zatim još jednom oduzeo servis rivalu za konačnih 6:1. Drugi set trajao je 37 minuta.
Protivnik Špancu u polufinalu biće mladi Kanađanin Denis Šapovalov, koji je lako izbacio drugu uzdanicu domaćina, Gaela Monfisa, sa 2:0(6:2, 6:2). I taj meč je trajao kratko, kao i Đokovićev sa Cicipasom, a završio se posle 61 minuta.
U prvom polufinalu, u subotu od 14 časova, Novak Đoković će igrati protiv Bugarina Grigora Dimitrova, koji je u četvrtfinalu bio bolji od Čileanca Kristijana Garina.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Nadal in the semifinals, Cong Short Breath
01 Nov 2019, 21:52 by Darko
Two more steps share Rafael Nadal's title at one of the two Masters he misses in the collection. The Spaniard made it to the semi-finals of Paris, beating Joe Wilfried Conge 7: 6 (4), 6: 1 after an hour and 36 minutes of play in Bersiy in two sets.
Conga did a great job in the first set and didn't allow any break balls, as of Monday, to the world's first tennis player. The experienced Frenchman had a small chance at that break, but he pinned Nadal with 7: 4.
There was no real fight in the second set, the Spaniard came to the break early, led with 3: 0, and then once again took away the service rival for the final 6: 1. The second set lasted 37 minutes.
The Spaniard's opponent in the semifinals will be young Canadian Denis Shapovalov, who easily knocked out the second reliever of the host, Gael Monfis, with 2: 0 (6: 2, 6: 2). And that match lasted a short time, as did Djokovic's with Cicipas, and ended after 61 minutes.
In the first semifinal, on Saturday from 2 pm, Novak Djokovic will play against Bulgarian Grigor Dimitrov, who was better than Chilean Christian Garin in the quarterfinals.
